title: My Hubby Frequently Loses His Memory - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Historical   Mystery   Romance   Wuxia   Yaoi
tags: Amnesia   Average-looking Protagonist   Black Belly   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Mysterious Past   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sickly Characters   Tragic Past   Tsundere   Zombies
author: 一念
description:
City of Roars, the biggest city in Wulin underworld (the circle of martial artists, same meaning as Jianghu) was destroyed overnight, and people from all walks of life went to investigate. Yun Biechen was entrusted as the Alliance Chief of the Five Mountains in this critical moment to find out the truth. Yet never had he expected to meet a mysterious guy.

The mysterious guy: Honey, I lost my memory. Please take good care of me…

Yun Biechen: …

Always speaking in a cutesy and sweet voice? OK, fine.

Frequently losing memory and having particular interest in flirting with beauties? OK, fine.

Special tastes for wearing makeups and red robes? OK, fine!

Constantly eating my tofu? Fu*k off and die!>
